name: TapTapFreeCell
description:
A FreeCell implementation where you tap, never drag, to move. Tap where you want to move from, tap where you want to move to. Game play is fast and simple.

Power user features (available with in-app purchase) include:

* Card sequences are outlined
* Legal moves are highlighted
* Sequence moves and supermoves work automatically
* Intelligent automove-to-foundations and endgame
* Card finding

Other features:

* Numbered Microsoft deals
* Game export and import
* Statistics listing played games, times, number of moves
* Replay lost games
